wordGroup: reconstructive surgery 重建外科；置换外科

sentences.en: I needed reconstructive surgery to give me a new nose.
sentences.cn: 我需要外科改造术来给我一个新鼻子。

sentences.en: FACIAL reconstructive surgery gets a bad rap.
sentences.cn: 面部重建外科手术备受批评。

sentences.en: There is no reconstructive process that can lower the pattern's energy level.
sentences.cn: 没有重构过程可以再降低图案的能量级别。
